website_summaries.verdict: A fun-looking beer pong table by a top brand with the bonus of cup holders to keep drinks secure.
pros: Features holes for holding cups of beer, which help prevent spills during beer pong competitions
Table has a reasonably durable build and is easy to set up for parties and fold for storage
Bold graphics are designed to grab the attention of party-goers
cons: Lights are optional, but don't come standard with this model

customer_reviews.title: If you are thinking about it- just get this one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! What a beautiful table!! The graphics are gorgeous, the lights are amazing!!! What a perfect addition to any party!! A must have! I LOVE LOVE it!!! And it arrived so much sooner than expected!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pinto-Bedoya

customer_reviews.title: Was looking forward to this purchase! But...
customer_reviews.text: The table looked of great quality and the reviews were good, until I actually received it. The lights on the description are blue and red ..I received blue and orange 😒 The craftsmanship is bad...not what I expected ...the lights are glued all around and there was so much of it still visible. ..the decal was not trimmed at some places so it sticks out at parts where it's suppose to be tucked in...the whole concept is ideal but not happy with what I received ..it does seem like it's sturdy and the cup holes were the only flawless part but over all not worth what I payed..considering a return 😓
customer_reviews.author: mari2816

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit at my party and loved the LED light display
customer_reviews.text: Was a hit at my party and loved the LED light display! I do wish the table was a little sturdier. Handled with care when unfolding/folding because the aluminum frame seems a little flimsy. It was easy to install the AA batteries (you need 6 and they are not included). I also like the options for the LED lights. Overall, it is a great product and I would consider purchasing from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Holes were a bad idea
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve got a table without the holes. Makes it impossible to adjust the cups to different forms. The plastic makes the balls too bounces. A wood board is better to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Dope affff !
customer_reviews.text: Can I just take a moment to say how badass this table is!? As soon as I got the package I had to test it out. The graphics are really neat, and the holes are great because there's less spillage. Set up wasn't even that bad for doing it by myself even though the directions suggested you should have two people (which would've be a little easier) but hey. I was too excited. I love the complimentary balls and I even got like this cute little beer pong towel! Putting it back together was a breeze too. Overall I really dig it. It's definitely a great investment when you have people over all the time. Thanks so much! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Analysa Talarico

customer_reviews.title: Best beer pong Table
customer_reviews.text: This beer pong is worth every penny!!!! I was skeptical about the price, but after all I was not disappointed. It doesn’t look cheap and it’s very very eye catching. I am so excited to use it for the first time
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Sets up easy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy table. Sets up and take down easily. The only thing that we didnt like is that it gets watermarks easily. But as long as you wipe it down regularly it wont stain.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rochell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. The design is really nice and it looks just as advertised. Very good quality. It was packaged very securely upon arrive. The table included assembly/care instructions, pong balls, and even a personalized thank you for purchasing note.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This table is pretty sweet and I was hesitant about getting it after reading some of the reviews but nothing is coming off, all the lights work just fine, my only concern is keeping the lights on for an extended amount of time because it start hissing which is never good but I've only brought it out once and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Camille-E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any party
customer_reviews.text: This table was a hit for my son's 21st birthday celebration. Got so many compliments and everyone loved it. Just as described.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product. I am pleased! Since being quarantined, this was something to do to pass the time Saturday night. Thank you Adam!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: All good but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! However it is light aluminum material. Not as sturdy as I would have liked. Other than that great for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Griselda

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, one of the battery pack was on ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, one of the battery pack was on the other side suck so when I first opened it the wires broke in half. I was able to fix it with electric tape and got it working again. Other then that problem so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: StefTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Party necessity
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! The lights add a cool effect to your game! It's easy to assemble and carry around. Great length for a table and the cups stay in very well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together and is portable. The design and options to add holes (to avoid spills) were amazing options to make it unique and my own. So much fun and will last me forever. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For College
customer_reviews.text: I love it, absolutely necessary for college. Looks good, easy to carry, solid bounces, not much more I could ask for with this product. Seller is also fantastic. Probably my best Amazon purchase so far, seriously.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: The table stands at a good height and the pattern is awesome. Bought this for a birthday trip and my friends and I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Regan Light

customer_reviews.title: Its awsome!
customer_reviews.text: I love my beer pong table! It came with 6 white beer pong balls and they threw in a beer sleeve too! I bought it because I had a glow party, but I knew I stilll was going to keep on using it after the party, my friends love it too 😊 has withstand many epic battles of beer pong. Seller was nice and even arrived a day before. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable Fun for Parties
customer_reviews.text: This table is well made, easy to move/carry around (it folds up into a compact square with a handle), and most importantly, a blast to play with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lindh

customer_reviews.title: GRRRRREEEAT
customer_reviews.text: This it's a bad ass table. I received it and I couldn't have been happier. It's perfect!! And it's not super heavy to carry around. 😁

customer_reviews.title: Just get it already, you won't regret it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Table!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT Table! So happy with this purchase, this was the hit at our Halloween party. We got as a gift for friends and we are thinking of purchasing one for our self's!

customer_reviews.text: Table arrived very quick, and we broke it out straight away. Construction is very good. Table top vinyl seems to be very good quality. We're already using and enjoying the table.

product_meta.title: PartyPongTables.com 8-Foot Professional Beer Pong Table w/Optional Cup Holes & LED Lights - Bubbles and Color Spectrum Editions
product_meta.description: Party Pong Professional Beer Pong Tables are for everyone looking for an affordable; portable beer pong table. Anodized aluminum framing and legs make these tables the most durable beer pong tables on the market; capable of withstanding extreme temperatures; liquids and physical abuse. The Professional beer pong table conveniently folds into a 2 ft. x 2 ft. case making it portable and convenient to bring to any party; tailgate or event. Cup Holes for the game cups prevent cups from sliding and spilling.
feature_bullets: 8 Foot Beer Pong Table w/ Cup Holes
ACTUAL holes keeping game cups from sliding & spilling
Wax finish that deflects liquids and protects the table
Table easily folds into carrying case w/ latch & handles.
Attached Pong Ball Holder w/ (6) Party Pong Balls
